title: Student Activity Centre Inauguration
description: Join us for the grand inauguration of the Student Activity Centre (SAC) - the heart of campus innovation! Presented by the Institute Innovation Council, the SAC is all about personal growth, skill development, and an unforgettable campus experience.
Get ready for an interactive keynote by tech pro, Pulkit Pagare, as he shares invaluable insights on mastering coding interviews at top MNCs.
We've got some tricks up our sleeves to make this event unforgettable! Expect inspiration, new connections, and a secret surprise!
Don't miss out! Come celebrate with us and kickstart your journey at the Student Activity Centre. See you there!
